alienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Pleasure den worker
alienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME worked in a pleasure den as a companion.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Medical experiment
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was experimented on relentlessly by doctors.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Arcade manager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME managed and maintained a full arcade.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet vlogger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Famous on many Glitterworlds, NAME Vlogged almost every moment of HIS lives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet cook
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME hosted a show on the Exonet about cooking.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hyper gladiator
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME participated in many games of strength and skill.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mega-farm tender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME tended to crops on a Mega-Farm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Asteroid miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME mined for minerals on asteroids around their home planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exonet librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME maintained a database of data on the Exonet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Janitor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a janitor in a ultrastructure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sculptor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME created many works of art out of stone, clay and wood.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME raised and cared for many animals on a Mega-Farm.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Competitive shooter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent many days in the shooting range training.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Natural artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME created unconventional art using plants.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: VR pornstar
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME showed HIS bits for Bits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Unlicensed pharmacist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME bought and sold many drugs on the street to get by.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Crypto banker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME processed transactions for Cryptocurreny banks.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Code dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME bought and sold exclusive and illegal code.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exile
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME did something terrible and was exiled from society because of it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Revolutionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME participated in a revolution to free their people. They were removed from the colony because of it.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME maintained many machines, big and small.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Water purity enforcer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME helped purify water for the populace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Living furniture
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was used as a piece of furniture for most of their lives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Living art
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME spent most days posed in a traveling art installation.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Demolitionist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Sometimes, to create, you must destroy. NAME did just that.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Syntho dealer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME made their way buying and selling their own kind on the black market.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Undercity miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME mined out old buildings, ores and rock beneath the city.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was a chef for a very rich Glitterworlder.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Glitter security
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: NAME was an Enforcer employed by a megacorporation.
